properties.description: Open for tea, coffee, biscuits and cake, on a Wednesday 10.00am to 12.00am. There is then a craft circult group 2.00pm to 4.00pm All welcome!
properties.title: All Hallows Church

properties.description: All age groups are encoraged to come along and meet up. Our Community Coffee morning is every Friday morning in our Support & Wellbeing centre and is free and open to everyone, a friendly place to meet for a chat and a cuppa.
properties.title: Bassetlaw Hospice

properties.description: Open for tea, coffee, biscuits and cake, on a Tuesday 10.00am to 12.00 noon. Followed by soup, rolls or toast lunch from 12.00 noon to 2.00pm There is then a craft circult group 2.00pm to 4.00pm All welcome!
properties.title: St Michael's Community Hall
